text:
This page organizes all corpora which have resulted from or have been used in our research. Their availability for Webis externals is as follows: (1) corpora that have been officially released by Webis can be downloaded here, (2) corpora of the PAN and Touché series can be downloaded here, (3) internal Webis corpora (which will be officially released in the future) are supplied upon request, (4) other corpora can be downloaded from their original publisher/creator via the provided links.
Most of our released corpora are hosted at Zenodo and are indexed in the Google Dataset Search ; a few larger corpora are available in the Internet Archive ; some corpora are accessibly via the Hugging Face and IR datasets libraries; the –symbol indicates a browsing facility for the respective corpus.
